entry.title: 85" x 85" Black Pintuck Square Overlay
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2220
Type: Overlays
Price: 9.88

[About]

Quantity: 1 Table Overlay
Material: Taffeta Pintuck
Color: Black
Size: 85" x 85"
Each Square Measures: 3" x 3"
Edges: Serged
How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, Don't use a dryer.
Perfect to be used on top of our tablecloths as accents.
Can be used for weddings, banquets, or any type of celebration.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Pintuck is actually a fold of fabric that is stitched intricately to hold it in a place, very much like a pleat. These lovely pleats impart a decorative effect to the fabric by fashioning a visual line at a chosen point. They effortlessly bridge vintage and contemporary styles to create a majestic new classic look. If you do not want your celebration to blend in with other weddings, birthdays, and anniversaries, try our premium quality pintuck overlays that contain everything you need to lend your event the look and aura that it deserves. Celebrate your special day with our splendid square pintuck style table cloths spread elegantly atop your plain and ordinary table covers. Be the show stopper by designing some awesome bows and other accents with pintuck patterns and style. Create an inviting ambiance for your guests by throwing a pintuck theme ambiance containing squared pattern napkins, sashes, runners, and linens.

Additional Information:

  • Measurements: 85" x 85" Square
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • Material: Taffeta Pintuck.  Edges are Serged.
  • Each square measures: 3"x3".
  • Perfect to be used on top of our tablecloths as accents.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

entry.title: 8FTx8FT | VIP Crown Vinyl Party Backdrop, Twinkle Golden Stars Photography Background Party Banner - Black/Gold
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3110
Type: Backdrops
Price: 25.19

[About]

Quantity: 1 Party Backdrop
Material: Vinyl
Style: VIP Crown
Height: 8FT
Width: 8FT
GSM: 110
Features: Bright colors, Cost-effective, Foldable storage, Light weight
Fix the backdrop to walls with nails or tape.
You can also support it with a backdrop stand and clamps instead.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

 

    [Information]

    Additional Information:

    • Since the Vinyl Backdrop do not have Rod Pockets (It is a Flat Backdrop), you will need to use Clamps to hang the item for use
    • Perfect for Indoor and Outdoor shooting.
    • You can also use some decorations to create a unique and exclusive party.
    • How to Care: Do not dry clean or machine wash. Wipe with a soft damp cloth. The item is sent folded and might have slight creases. If necessary, please iron the back surface with steam iron at low heat.  Or roll it up tightly with tube for 3-4 days. Please do not iron the front of the backdrop
    • Uses: Party, Baby Shower Event, Wedding Decoration, Newborn Baby, DIY Studios, Digital Photography, Video Shooting, Theme Parties.

entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4810
Type: Vases
Price: 29.99

[About]

Quantity: 2 Glass Vases (Different Size)
Material: Glass
Color: Matte Black
Style: Matte Finish Geometric Glass Vases
Small Vase Size: 5.5"H x 6.25"W
Large Vase Size: 7.75"H x 5.75"W
Glass Thickness: 5mm
Small Vase Top Opening: 3"
Small Vase Base: 3.5"
Small Vase Depth: 4.75"
Large Vase Top Opening: 4.25"
Large Vase Base: 4.25"
Large Vase Depth: 7.5" 
Base of both vases are clear / see-through
Small Vase has Top and Base shaped as a Pentagon
Large Vase has Top and Base shaped as a Hexagon
Perfect for floral and candle displays
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Small size ideal for placement on shelf, windowsill, desk, and tabletop surfaces
  • Unique geometric design complements modern decors
  • Item is for Vases Only. Flowers and other decorative accessories not included.
  • Great for everyday decor or for use as decorative centerpieces for weddings and special events
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

      • Warning: The cupcake toppers are disposable and not edible and intended for decoration only, please don't put these cake toppers in oven/microwave and keep it away from children and pets.

      • Metal Protrusions: 1" Length x 3mm Width
      • 2 Metal Protrusions holding up each tier
      • Base Round Pegs Diameter: 0.75"
    • Upper | Bottom Tray

      • End Pole Hole Diameter: 3/8"
      • No. of Cupcakes both tray can hold:
        • Large: 10x
        • Standard/Medium: 14x
        • Small/Mini: 70x

        • Small/Mini: 90x

      • Large: 2.5"
      • Standard/Medium: 2"
      • Small/Mini: 1"
    • Accessories Included:
      • Screw Size: 0.75" Length x 4mm Width
      • Screwdriver Size: 3" Length x 1.25" Width x 0.25" Diameter
    • NOTE: Main difference between the Black vs Gold Cupcake Stand is there are 2 handle bars (aka Metal Protrusions) holding up each tier for the black (instead of 1 on gold).
